name: Utility Support Group (USG) B.V.
membership: USG is among others participating in/ or member of CEFIC (European Chemical Industry Council), Plastics Europe, VNCI (Dutch Chemical association), IFIEC, Alliance of Energy Intensive Industries, VEMW, VNO-NCW and EASEE-gas
goal:
Utility Support Group (USG) is the energy and utility supplier of the industrial site Chemelot in the Southern part of the Netherlands. Main companies present on the site are a.o. Sabic, OCI, DSM and Lanxess.

USG buys for its customers the energy and utilities that are needed for their operations. Jointly purchasing of these products leads to significant price advantages and improved negotiating position.

USG also supports in emissions trading and climate policy advocacy.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives: Policies related to Energy & Climate Policies, Environmental Policy, Internal Markets, Taxation, Competitiveness
